CustomField.description: Use the DeveloperName for the various Record Types. If you enter one that doesn't exist, this row will not be functional and there will be a debug statement in the code for record types that don't exist.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use the DeveloperName for the various Record Types. If you enter one that doesn't exist, this row will not be functional and there will be a debug statement in the code for record types that don't exist.
CustomField.label: Case Record Types
